description:
The Open Championship, often referred to as The Open or the British Open, is the oldest golf tournament in the world, and one of the most prestigious. 

The 2022 Open Championship, officially the 150th Open Championship, will be played July 14-17 on the Old Course at St Andrews, Scotland.

markets.description:
The Open Championship (the Open , the British Open), is the oldest golf tournament in the world, and one of the most prestigious. The Open is one of the four men's major golf tournaments, the others being the Masters Tournament, the PGA Championship and the U.S. Open. The current champion is Collin Morikawa. 

The 2022 Open Championship, (officially the 150th Open Championship), will be played July 14-17 in Scotland and is made up of 156 players, who gained entry through various exemption criteria and qualifying tournaments.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Rory McIlroy wins the 2022 Open Championship and to "No" otherwise. 

If for any reason the winner is not decided by July 24, 2022 (11 PM ET), this market will resolve to "No".
markets.question: 2022 Open Championship: Will Rory McIlroy win?

markets.description:
The Open Championship, often referred to as The Open or the British Open, is the oldest golf tournament in the world, and one of the most prestigious.  The 2022 Open Championship, officially the 150th Open Championship, will be played July 14-17 on the Old Course at St Andrews, Scotland.

The Open Championship is a 72-hole (4 rounds) stroke play competition held over 4 days, with 18 holes played each day. After Round 2 there is a "cut", after which the top 70 and tied players advance to compete in the third and fourth rounds. This is a market on whether American player Tiger Woods "makes the cut", meaning: advances to the third round of the tournament.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Tiger Woods makes the cut at the 2022 Open Championship. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If for any reason the results of the tournament are not decided by July 24, 2022 (11 PM ET), this market will resolve to "No".
markets.groupItemTitle: Will Tiger Woods make the cut?
markets.question: 2022 Open Championship: Will Tiger Woods make the cut?

The 2022 Open Championship, (officially the 150th Open Championship), will be played July 14-17 in Scotland and is made up of 156 players, who gained entry through various exemption criteria and qualifying tournaments.

markets.question: 2022 Open Championship: Will Cameron Smith win?

markets.description:
The Open Championship (the Open, the British Open), is the oldest golf tournament in the world, and one of the most prestigious. The 2022 Open Championship, (officially the 150th Open Championship), will be played July 14-17 in Scotland. It is made up of 156 players who gained entry through various exemption criteria and qualifying tournaments.

LIV Golf, started in June 2022, is a professional golf tour financed by the Public Investment Fund, the sovereign wealth fund of Saudi Arabia. Its emergence and the extraordinary money behind it has plunged the sport into tumult and financial upheaval. It has been criticized by human rights groups as an example of sportswashing by Saudi Arabia. The 'traditional' golf organizations are grappling with how to combat LIV Golf's massive purses for golfers who join the controversial breakout league. 

The controversy looms over the British Open, but despite efforts to disallow the "LIV players" from attending future major competitions, they continue to be eligible to compete at the Old Course in Scotland. However, the Royal & Ancient Golf Club of St Andrews that runs the tournament informed the chief executive of the LIV Golf series, Greg Norman, that he was not welcome at any Open events. The "LIV players", who are on the LIV Golf roster, are the players considered in this market. Their names are listed below.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if one of the players competing in the LIV Tour, as listed below, wins the 2022 Open Championship and to "No" otherwise. If for any reason the winner is not decided by July 24, 2022 (11 PM ET), this market will resolve to "No".

Please note that only the players named in the list below count in this market. No other winner of the 2022 Open Championship can trigger "Yes" resolution.

-----------------------------------

List of LIV players competing in the 2022 Open Championship:

Abraham Ancer
Richard Bland
Laurie Canter
Bryson DeChambeau
Sergio Garcia
Talor Gooch
Justin Harding
Sam Horsfield
Dustin Johnson
Sadom Kaewkanjana
Sihwan Kim
Brooks Koepka
Pablo Larrazábal
Jediah Morgan
Kevin Na
Shaun Norris
Louis Oosthuizen
Phil Mickelson
Ian Poulter
Patrick Reed
Scott Vincent
Lee Westwood
Bernd Wiesberger
markets.question: 2022 Open Championship: Will a LIV Golf player win the tournament?

title: Golf: 2022 Open Championship
